mapper.select: SELECT u.*, m.* FROM user u LEFT JOIN member m ON u.idx = m.idx WHERE u.user_role="ROLE_USER"
SELECT u.*, m.* FROM user u INNER JOIN member m ON u.idx = m.idx WHERE u.idx = #{idx}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user (user_id, user_pw, reg_date, user_role) VALUES (#{userId}, #{userPw}, now(), #{userRole})
INSERT INTO member (idx, user_name, user_email) VALUES (#{idx}, #{userName}, #{userEmail})
INSERT INTO admin (idx, user_name, user_email) VALUES (#{idx}, #{userName}, #{userEmail})
